title: The thumbnails downloader for TDS has been revamped
description: We previously released the Paradoxum Game Page Resources for wiki editors to access high-quality Roblox thumbnails and icons. It was simple at first, but it has now been revamped!

title: TDS Stats Editor Major Update #3: Randomizer
description: The release of the long awaited Randomizer feature, allowing you to create randomized towers with ease. Oh, and the wiki got revamped in the same style as the Statistics Editor too!

title: The Skill Tree Planner for TDS
description: Plan out your skill tree before grinding your butt off in TDS!

title: Hey, tds-editor.live is now tds-editor.com!
description: We moved domains, make sure to remember it smh.

title: Tower Defense Simulator Tier List Maker
description: Tired of manually importing images on TierMaker? Well, here ya go.

title: An Easier Way to Get Thumbnails and Icons
description: A tool to help wiki editors with getting game thumbnails and icons, duh.

title: TDS Stats Editor Major Update #2: Hello Mobile!
description: Our biggest update yet delievers the long awaited mobile support and many more!

title: TDS Stats Editor Major Update #1
description: New features and improvements in the first ever major update of the site!

title: The New and Improved Stats Editor for TDS
description: Introducing our fork of the website with various enhancements.
